thread.title: Trip of the week: Beautiful Beijing and the Wall
thread.title_full: Trip of the week: Beautiful Beijing and the Wall

title: Trip of the week: Beautiful Beijing and the Wall
text:
By Cindy Decker Dispatch â€¢ Sunday August 30, 2015 5:00 AM 
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox. 
Beautiful Beijing and the Wall 
ADVENTURE LIFE, 1-800-344-6118, www.adventure-life.com 
THE TRIP: This six-day package begins with an exploration of Beijing and popular attractions such as the Forbidden City, Summer Palace and Temple of Heaven. 
Guests will also hike along the Great Wall, bicycle to and through several old neighborhoods, try cooking Chinese cuisine, explore the Art Zone in an area of decommissioned military factories and visit Olympic Park. 
Included are five nights of hotel accommodations; five breakfasts, five lunches and three dinners; and four days of private English-language guide service. 
THE COST: from $1,535, double occupancy 
@DispatchTravel
